Uses of Interface
org.w3c.dom.as.ASModel

Packages that use ASModel
com.xhive.dom.interfaces This package contains the library interfaces (for collections of documents) and X-Hive specific extensions to the W3C DOM Interfaces, as well as interfaces related to special DOM related data. 
org.w3c.dom.as These are the interfaces of the DOM Abstract Schema specification. 
 

Uses of ASModel in com.xhive.dom.interfaces
 

Methods in com.xhive.dom.interfaces that return ASModel
 ASModel XhiveCatalogIf.getASModelByCatalogId(long id)
          Return the ASModel with the passed catalog id (which matches the library id of libraries), or null if no model with such an id is available.
 ASModel XhiveCatalogIf.getASModelById(java.lang.String id, boolean includeHigherLevelCatalogs)
          Retrieve an abstract schema by its id from this catalog.
 ASModel XhiveCatalogIf.getASModelByPublicId(java.lang.String publicId)
          Deprecated. use getASModelById(String id, boolean includeHigherLevelCatalogs) instead
 ASModel XhiveCatalogIf.getASModelByPublicId(java.lang.String publicId, boolean includeHigherLevelCatalogs)
          Deprecated. use getASModelById(String id, boolean includeHigherLevelCatalogs) instead
 ASModel XhiveCatalogIf.getDefaultASModel()
          This function only applies to DTDs.
 

Methods in com.xhive.dom.interfaces that return types with arguments of type ASModel
 java.util.Iterator<ASModel> XhiveCatalogIf.getASModels()
          Deprecated. use getASModels(boolean includeHigherLevelCatalogs) instead
 java.util.Iterator<ASModel> XhiveCatalogIf.getASModels(boolean includeHigherLevelCatalogs)
          Get an iterator containing ASModel objects for all the abstract schemas in this catalog, optionally including all ASModels found in higher level catalogs.

          Returns an iterator containing all documents using the model.
 void XhiveCatalogIf.removeASModel(ASModel model)
          Remove an abstract schema from this catalog (or the catalog where the ASModel actually resides).
 void XhiveCatalogIf.setDefaultASModel(ASModel model)
          This function only applies to DTDs.
 void XhiveCatalogIf.setPublicId(java.lang.String id, ASModel model)
          Sets the PUBLIC id value in the catalog of a contained abstract schema.
 void XhiveCatalogIf.setSchemaId(java.lang.String fileName, ASModel model)
          Sets the filename of an abstract schema of type XML Schema contained by the catalog.
 void XhiveCatalogIf.setSystemId(java.lang.String id, ASModel model)
          Sets the system id value in the catalog of a contained abstract schema.
